attributes.action: Recognise Atheism as on a par with all religious faiths, thereby enabling the prosecution of Richard Dawkins on grounds of incitement to religious disharmony.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I specified religious 'disharmony' instead of violence, though I am unconvinced that this is against the law. However, given the duration of the petition, I fully expect it to be in the near future.
